apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully captures a moment of connection, showing two people with medium-dark and dark skin tones holding hands, their fingers interlocked with Apple's characteristic smooth rendering. The gentle curvature of their hands and the subtle shading created by realistic lighting emphasize their bond and solidarity. Crafted with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges, this emoji universally symbolizes friendship, partnership, romance, or any close relationship, conveying unity and support across messages on Apple devices.
